name: Yellove
description:
💛Yellove

💛Yellove is a game about two characters who love going for a car rider together.

Your job is to build a lovely road and fill the lovometer. The border of the yellow meter will turn yellow when it's full. At that point, you have won the game!

The lovometer is filled when the two characters are moving close to each other. Be careful though ! 

They will stop and love each other if they get too close.
That's when a game ends.

How to build a road ?

You create new turns by draging out a road segment or delete them by straightening them out. 

For security measures, sharp turns aren't allowed ! We do not want our two lovebirds to have an accident...
